title: Graphic Designer
description: Worked as a Graphic Designer at LEADER SIGN in the UAE for a year. Created a wide range of designs, including logos, 3D signboards, and comprehensive brand identities, contributing to the visual branding and marketing success of various clients.

title: Freelancer
description: Provided freelance services for multiple clients, including Python scripting, developing Django REST APIs, and designing websites and graphics. Collaborated as a Graphic and Website Designer for JACOLINK in the UAE, delivering high-quality solutions tailored to client needs.

title: Programmer
description: Dedicated to continuous learning and exploring emerging technologies. Engaged in diverse personal projects to enhance problem-solving skills and deepen technical expertise across various domains, from programming to system design.

title: Developer
description: Worked in collaboration with the highly experienced owner of OBS, who has over 20+ years of expertise in software development. Contributed as a developer and designer on a comprehensive learning management system project designed for schools and colleges. Responsibilities included designing intuitive interfaces, implementing core functionality, and ensuring seamless user experiences tailored to the needs of educational institutions.
